attributes.additional_details:
Could ‘Renewable’ Marriage Be The Answer To UK’s Marriage Crisis? With the high rate of divorce, an increase in people choosing not to get married and more unhappy spouses joining dating sites looking for affairs, We are calling on the UK government to debate the introduction of renewal dates on marriages.

A recent independent study revealed that a third of married people believed they had wed the wrong person.

Further research conducted by IllicitEncounters.com revealed that 59% of married people feel the current marriage system is outdated

In the same survey over half would support a marriage license that has an expiry date.
